> What is up with these people? Why do they hate samurai so much?

Because they don't understand that samurai are ~people~ and people are
all different and unique not all evil not all good...they only see
stereotypes.  Close-mindedness is very common in the academic setting,
wait I should add 
close-mindedness+advanced degree= stubborn people who hand out your grades
